about_the_game:
All fire and flame!

Gon is a sweet little Dragoone but not so easy to tame!
Naturally wary, Gon often changes color to blend into the environment.
You'll have to be patient to tame those chameleon scales. It'll be worth the trouble, though!

Once tamed, Gon will be a big help in fights!
Choose from among various skills:
BLAST: Lowers the Wakfu of a random card.
WRATH: Has a chance to use Surge on the first enemy.
RATTLING SCALES: Has a chance to trigger Fervor on cards in hand.

Take care of Gon to make your relationship grow!
The more you play with this companion, the stronger its skills will get as you progress in the game.
But like any creature, this Dragoone needs a special diet.
If you want it to level up, you'll have to find as many elite fights as you can.
You may end up taking risks, but hey, you'd do anything to make this little lizard turn into a proud dragon!
